00094 template <typename I>
00095 inline ximpl_integer::ff_to_i_r_t_ to_x(
00096     I const& value
00097 )
00098 {
00099     STLSOFT_STATIC_ASSERT(stlsoft::is_integral_type<I>::value);
00100 
00101     return 
00102 #if !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE)
00103       ::fastformat::inserters::
00104 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
00105         ximpl_integer::integer_helper_hex_3(value, ximpl_integer::default_width_sentinel_(), ximpl_integer::default_precision_sentinel_(), false);
00106 }
00107

00121 inline ximpl_integer::ff_to_i_r_t_ to_X(

00123 )

00128 #if !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE)

00131         ximpl_integer::integer_helper_hex_3(value, ximpl_integer::default_width_sentinel_(), ximpl_integer::default_precision_sentinel_(), true);
00132 }
